Rationale: Best overall: pre-funding, standardized promises + gold-standard outcomes; scalable.
Triangulation where overlap exists: demo-day text + high-stakes pitch + outcomes (smaller N, high validity).
Elite, high-quality text + outcomes; smaller N but strong identification for mechanisms.
Deep tech/hardware coverage; strong for high-integration-cost moderator; higher extraction cost.
Most feasible but method risk: ensure ex-ante snapshot only; otherwise exclude.
Useful as robustness and contrast; outcome comparability cautions; mapping can be partial.
